product.title: Daytona Antique White - Plantation Shutter
product.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Galaxy Plantation Green Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The warm tones of the galaxy plantation roman blind are sure to enrich your space. Making the most of a plain design, the curtain features a defined woven finish that gives an attractive textural effect. The fabric is woven with silvery metallic yarn alongside earthy tones of green to create a surprise touch of sparkle. relproducts.title: Galaxy Plantation Green Curtain
relproducts.description: Complement your design scheme with the warm earthy tones of the galaxy plantation green curtain. Drawing strength from a simple design, the curtain features a defined woven texture for an appealing rustic style. The finished effect has hidden depths in the form of a subtle sparkle from metallic yarn incorporated into the green weave. relproducts.title: Daytona Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

relproducts.title: Daytona Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Match the horizon grey to a rich red feature wall for a look that really stands out. This cosy colour scheme is perfect for a living room.

relproducts.title: Daytona Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

relproducts.title: Daytona Cool White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

relproducts.title: Daytona Soho - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: In attractive grey-toned cream, the daytona soho is the perfect neutral. It will work with a number of colour schemes and is available in three distinct styles of shutter. The water-resistant faux wood is guaranteed not to crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the soho into a bedroom, living room, or master bedroom full of coordinating shades of grey, including charcoal greys, dove greys, and oatmeal greys.

relproducts.title: Daytona Linen - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The pretty cream tone of the daytona in linen is soft and cosy, and covers the shutters flawlessly. Durable, water-resistant faux wood means no cracking and no warping, making them perfect for any room in the home, even bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the linen amidst warm chocolate browns and subtle lattes for a relaxing and luxurious look in the master bedroom or living room. Keep the room feeling light and airy with plenty of matching creams and lots of light.

relproducts.title: Daytona Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.
